languages.text: "В словах глубокоуважаемого Наместника есть здравый смысл, Лорд-капитан". {n}Абеляр морщится, словно само согласие с Владаймом по какому бы то ни было поводу ему глубоко противно.{/n} "Признаться, залезать в гнездо болезни — не лучшая из идей".

"The honoured Liege's words aren't devoid of sense, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard winces, as if he finds the very idea of agreeing with Vladaym on any matter profoundly distasteful.{/n} "I must say, venturing into a den of disease does not sound like the wisest of ideas."
languages.original_text: "В словах глубокоуважаемого Наместника есть здравый смысл, Лорд-капитан". {n}Абеляр морщится, словно само согласие с Владаймом по какому бы то ни было поводу ему глубоко противно.{/n} "Признаться, залезать в гнездо болезни — не лучшая из идей".

traits.locale_text: "The honoured Liege's words aren't devoid of sense, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard winces, as if he finds the very idea of agreeing with Vladaym on any matter profoundly repulsive.{/n} "I must say, venturing into a den of disease does not sound like the wisest of ideas."

"The honoured Liege's words aren't devoid of sense, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard winces, as if he finds the very idea of agreeing with Vladaym on any matter profoundly repulsive.{/n} "I must say, venturing into a den of disease does not sound like the wisest of ideas."

"The honoured Liege's words aren't devoid of sense, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard winces, as if he finds the very idea of agreeing with Vladaym on any matter profoundly distasteful.{/n} "I must say, venturing into a den of disease does not sound like the wisest of ideas."

"The honoured Liege's words aren't devoid of sense, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard winces, as if he finds the very idea of agreeing with Vladaym on any matter profoundly distasteful.{/n} "I must say, venturing into a den of disease does not sound like the wisest of ideas."

"The honoured Liege's words aren't devoid of sense, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard winces, as if he finds the very idea of agreeing with Vladaym on any matter profoundly distasteful.{/n} "I must say, venturing into a den of disease does not sound like the wisest of ideas."

languages.text: 「名誉ある領主の言葉にはいくらか意味があります、ロード・キャプテン」{n}アベラルドは、ヴラダイムに同意すること事態が非常に不快だというように顔をしかめた。{/n}「病の巣窟に敢えて足を踏み入れるのは、賢明な考えとは思えないと言わざるを得ません」
languages.original_text: "The honoured Liege's words aren't devoid of sense, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard winces, as if he finds the very idea of agreeing with Vladaym on any matter profoundly distasteful.{/n} "I must say, venturing into a den of disease does not sound like the wisest of ideas."

traits.locale_text: 「名誉ある領主の言葉にはいくらか意味があります、ロード・キャプテン」{n}アベラルドは、ヴラダイムに同意すること事態が非常に不快だというように顔をしかめた。{/n}「病の巣窟に敢えて足を踏み入れるのは、賢明な考えとは思えないと言わざるを得ません」

languages.text: “尊贵的总督言之有理，舰长大人。”{n}阿贝拉德面部肌肉抽搐了一下，似乎赞同弗拉迪姆的想法令他厌恶不已情。{/n}“我不得不说，冒险进入瘟疫的巢穴，听起来并不是个很明智的主意。”
languages.original_text: "The honoured Liege's words aren't devoid of sense, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard winces, as if he finds the very idea of agreeing with Vladaym on any matter profoundly distasteful.{/n} "I must say, venturing into a den of disease does not sound like the wisest of ideas."

traits.locale_text: “尊贵的总督言之有理，舰长大人。”{n}阿贝拉德面部肌肉抽搐了一下，似乎赞同弗拉迪姆的想法令他厌恶不已情。{/n}“我不得不说，冒险进入瘟疫的巢穴，听起来并不是个很明智的主意。”

languages.text: «Al honorable Señor no le falta razón, Lord Capitán». {n}Abelard da un respingo, como si la sola idea de estar de acuerdo con Vladaym en cualquier asunto le resultara profundamente desagradable.{/n} «He de decir que no parece buena idea adentrarse en una mina de enfermedades».
languages.original_text: "The honoured Liege's words aren't devoid of sense, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard winces, as if he finds the very idea of agreeing with Vladaym on any matter profoundly distasteful.{/n} "I must say, venturing into a den of disease does not sound like the wisest of ideas."

traits.locale_text: «Al honorable Señor no le falta razón, Lord Capitán». {n}Abelard da un respingo, como si la sola idea de estar de acuerdo con Vladaym en cualquier asunto le resultara profundamente desagradable.{/n} «He de decir que no parece buena idea adentrarse en una mina de enfermedades».

languages.text: « L'honorable suzerain n'a pas tort, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Abélard grimace, comme si la simple idée d'appuyer les mots de Vladaym le dégoûtait profondément, quel que soit le sujet.{/n} « Je dois bien avouer qu'il ne me paraît pas très raisonnable de s'aventurer dans une zone en proie à une maladie contagieuse. »
languages.original_text: "The honoured Liege's words aren't devoid of sense, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard winces, as if he finds the very idea of agreeing with Vladaym on any matter profoundly distasteful.{/n} "I must say, venturing into a den of disease does not sound like the wisest of ideas."

traits.locale_text: « L'honorable suzerain n'a pas tort, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Abélard grimace, comme si la simple idée d'appuyer les mots de Vladaym le dégoûtait profondément, quel que soit le sujet.{/n} « Je dois bien avouer qu'il ne me paraît pas très raisonnable de s'aventurer dans une zone en proie à une maladie contagieuse. »

languages.text: "Die Worte des ehrbaren Lehnsherren sind durchaus vernünftig, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht, so unangenehm ist ihm die Idee, mit Vladaym einer Meinung zu sein.{/n} "Ich würde auch sagen, der Vorstoß in einen Krankheitsherd klingt nicht besonders klug."
languages.original_text: "The honoured Liege's words aren't devoid of sense, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard winces, as if he finds the very idea of agreeing with Vladaym on any matter profoundly distasteful.{/n} "I must say, venturing into a den of disease does not sound like the wisest of ideas."

traits.locale_text: "Die Worte des ehrbaren Lehnsherren sind durchaus vernünftig, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht, so unangenehm ist ihm die Idee, mit Vladaym einer Meinung zu sein.{/n} "Ich würde auch sagen, der Vorstoß in einen Krankheitsherd klingt nicht besonders klug."

languages.text: "Onurlu Emîr'in sözleri sağduyudan yoksun değil Lord Kaptan." {n}Abelard, herhangi bir konuda Vladaym ile aynı fikirde olma düşüncesini fevkalade tatsız buluyormuş gibi yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Bir hastalık yuvasına girmeye teşebbüs etmek, pek de makul gelmiyor."
languages.original_text: "The honoured Liege's words aren't devoid of sense, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard winces, as if he finds the very idea of agreeing with Vladaym on any matter profoundly distasteful.{/n} "I must say, venturing into a den of disease does not sound like the wisest of ideas."

traits.locale_text: "Onurlu Emîr'in sözleri sağduyudan yoksun değil Lord Kaptan." {n}Abelard, herhangi bir konuda Vladaym ile aynı fikirde olma düşüncesini fevkalade tatsız buluyormuş gibi yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Bir hastalık yuvasına girmeye teşebbüs etmek, pek de makul gelmiyor."
